Sentencas: This work reports the room-temperature stabilization of the (Bi4V2-xFexO11-1.5x)-O-II gamma' phase, a promising ionic conductive material that finds application in solid oxide fuel cell and oxygen sensor devices.
Titulo: Stabilization of γ′ phase in Bi4V2-xFexIIO11-1.5x series

Sentencas: The Fe(II) cation proved to be a better stabilizer than Fe(III), which was previously used, since a lower substitution degree of V5+ is needed for the former.
Titulo: Stabilization of γ′ phase in Bi4V2-xFexIIO11-1.5x series

Sentencas: Powder X-ray diffraction, Fourier-transform infrared spectroscopy and differential scanning calorimetry were used in these experiments.
Titulo: Stabilization of γ′ phase in Bi4V2-xFexIIO11-1.5x series
